alert.note: Alert for Floyd (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 30 at 12:17PM EDT until July 31 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Levisa Fork at Prestonsburg affecting Floyd County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Levisa Fork at Prestonsburg. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Archer Park is inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 24.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is receding, but will continue to run high through early this evening. - Action stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 8 PM.
